channel.title: Changing the quest interface with my own pages
channel.description:
Im using dodian, devolution v7
On the quest menu there are the default quest.
I want to delete all those quest from the list and add my own pages.
Example
Help Commands Money Making Rules
and when they click on one of those it brings up a menu page with my content? so how do i do this, ive been trying to figure it out for 1 week now and im desperate. Ill be willing to make who ever helps me a admin on my server (average of 20 people online) and give them 10$ via paypal. So please help me! Thankyou

item.title: Changing the quest interface with my own pages
item.dc:creator: @remix_i_auto remix i auto
item.description:
@remix_i_auto wrote:

dude just search up the quest name you wanna change it should come to something like sendframe126"questname"
befor you ask in the client.java and if nothing comes up then your a douche[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2008, 03:30:09 AM[/size][hr]and to make it so you click on it and commands or something comes up find a old quest and just replace it with your interface options you want
